value.value: Crisis at Base 228

Thanks for the help, civilian.
It'll be safe once we're back on solid ground.

We have to rendezvous with the troops and deal with things on our end now, so this is where we say goodbye.
Monster Attack

We have arrived in town.
We're safe now.
At least, we should be.
Brink of Destruction

Monsters are everywhere.
Could it be because of that tower?
...Damn it!
If only we had come sooner.
Crumbling City

This city is safe. Let's hurry.
...?!
There's a monster in town!

We can't let it get away. Let's go.
Spawn Site

We've come this far, we should be fine.
Let's go. We're safe now.
Unmanned Bombers

Enemy ships have deployed drones. Quite a few of them, too.
Offensive teams currently en route... but a new drone model specialized in ground attacks has been identified, so we're bracing for a tough fight. Requesting for immediate backup.
Messenger of Disaster

Alien infantry is continuing to advance. The main body has been split into a handful of teams, controlling a large area.
Enemy infantry are approaching this area, as well. An offensive team has been deployed. Please cover us.
α Colony Swarm
A number of monster sightings have been reported in the city center. Please proceed to the location.
Airborne Invaders

This is an emergency.
Flying monsters are in the vicinity.
They cleared our defensive line with ease and have infiltrated the city center. Evacuation support will not arrive in time, leaving the civilians defenseless.

There's no time to lose. Teams deployed in the vicinity are to report to the area immediately.
Giant Monster Ball

A Gamma-type monster has infiltrated the city center.
Rendezvous with your team and prepare to eliminate the threat.
β Colony Rush

Monsters are multiplying everywhere and must be dealt with ASAP.

Our mission is to exterminate the Beta-type overrunning the city. Teams are few... so good luck out there.
City Destruction

Defense line has been crushed by a huge Gamma-type. Powered exoskeletons wiped out. The Gamma-type destroys buildings and vehicles, so conventional tactics will not work.

It has now infiltrated the city. Forces in the vicinity are to report to the area.
Paratroopers

Enemy ships have arrived, dropping alien paratroopers on the city.
Civilians have not been evacuated in time. Forces in the vicinity are to report ASAP to the area and eliminate the enemy paratroopers.
Operation Mountain Survey

These mountains are full of monsters.
There must be a large breeding ground somewhere nearby....
But this fight won't be an easy one.
Let's fall back for now and get into position.
Dark Strategy

Alien construction team spotted.
Looks like they're bringing something into the cave.

The aliens have already withdrawn, but... further investigation is required.
Infiltrate the cave and figure out what the aliens are hiding.
Contaminated Zone Part I

A large breeding site has been discovered. It seems that abandoned urban areas are becoming monster nests.
Quite a few monsters have already hatched and have begun to migrate to the surrounding areas.

Forces in the vicinity are to report to the site immediately. We must exterminate the monsters in the surrounding areas and clear the way to the breeding ground.
Contaminated Zone Part II
Upon arrival at the breeding ground, units are to begin extermination efforts immediately.
Code N

A monster, now of all times?!

Those who can still fight, go up to the surface.
Keep the monster away from the base.

Hurry, prepare to open fire!
Conflagration

This is a rescue request.
An extermination team has discovered a monster breeding site.
Attempts to destroy the eggs were made, but now the monster is fighting back. The situation is looking dire.

Please proceed at once to the location.
Remain vigilant, as the breeding site appears to be quite large.
